abstract: NHL Roundup; Pittsburgh Penguins rout Philadelphia Flyers, 6-2; other hockey scores noted.
lead_paragraph: The surging Penguins equaled their longest winning streak of the season at six games with a 6-2 victory over the visiting Philadelphia Flyers on Sunday.

headline.print_headline: Penguins Rout Flyers for Sixth Straight Victory
headline.main: Penguins Rout Flyers for Sixth Straight Victory

snippet: The surging Penguins equaled their longest winning streak of the season at six games with a 6-2 victory over the visiting Philadelphia Flyers on Sunday....
